author: James T. Areddy
title: Office Space: WeWork to Acquire Chinese Rival Naked Hub
text:
SHANGHAI—WeWork Cos., the shared-office space firm that has emerged as one of the world’s richest startups, said Thursday it will acquire Naked Hub, a primary competitor in China.
The deal combines two of the better-known brands in a sector that is both fast-growing and quickly consolidating in China, and which aims to change how businesses allocate their property spending. The Naked Hub brand will be retained in the country.
